sentences.en: Dally not with women or money.
sentences.cn: 对待女性要严肃,对待金钱要认真.

sentences.en: Don't dally about or we'll be late.
sentences.cn: 别磨磨蹭蹭了,要不然我们就来不及了.

sentences.en: Don't dally over these trifles , or we'll miss the train.
sentences.cn: 对于是否要买一辆新车,他们犹豫了很久, 还是迟迟下不了决心.

sentences.en: Don't dally over your meal, we don't want to miss our train.
sentences.cn: 你吃饭别再磨蹭啦, 我们不想误火车.

sentences.en: Don't dilly - dally ! Make up your mind!
sentences.cn: 别磨蹭了! 拿定主意罢!
别磨磨蹭蹭的, 快点!

sentences.en: Dont dally, go get it, said the custodian.
sentences.cn: 别磨磨蹭蹭的, 快去拿短剑.看管人说.
快开始工作吧,别吊儿郎当了!

sentences.en: How can you dally with such a serious problem?
sentences.cn: 你怎么可以轻率地对待如此严肃的问题?

sentences.en: I'm afraid we can not get there on time for the flight dally over.
sentences.cn: 因为班机延误,我们恐怕不能准时赶到了.

sentences.en: Never dally with a girl whom you don't intend to marry.
sentences.cn: 千万别和你不想娶的女子调情.

sentences.en: Now, should he go back to Wu Sun - fu's place and dally with her again?
sentences.cn: 回到吴公馆去再找林佩珊厮混 么 ?

trans.tran_cn: 玩弄, 戏弄, 延误
随随便便地对待，不很认真地考虑，浪费时间，调情
